Methods of Preparation
From Alkenes
Hydrogenation
From Alkenes
Hydrogenation
Answers
Some Points for Wrutz Reaction
1.
This method is not suitable in preparing unsymmetrical alkanes but very much suitable to prepare symmetrical alkanes
2.
This reaction is disproportionation reaction only one element is being oxidized and reduced
3.
3rd degree alkyl halides cannot be taken
4.
Methane cannot be prepared form this reaction.
Answers - 1 and 3
1 because its unsymmetrical
3 it will happen but because it is 3rd degree alkyl halide so will not be suitable
Wherever anion goes is anode, wherever cation goes is cathode - simple!
